mapper.select: select user_id,name,birthday,create_date,grade,to_char(trkwa_amt,'FM999,999,999,999') trkwa_amt, to_char(trforign_amt,'FM999,999,999,999') trforign_amt,to_char(val_amt,'FM999,999,999,999') val_amt, to_char(sonik_amt,'FM999,999,999,999') sonik_amt,to_char(suik_rate,'FM999,990.00') suik_rate,out_grade from ( select dd.user_id,dd.name,dd.birthday,dd.create_date, case when sum(dd.trkwa_amt) >= 10000000 then 'S등급' when sum(dd.trkwa_amt) >= 5000000 then 'A등급' when sum(dd.trkwa_amt) >= 3000000 then 'B등급' when sum(dd.trkwa_amt) >= 1000000 then 'C등급' else '일반' end as grade, sum(dd.trkwa_amt) trkwa_amt,sum(dd.trforign_amt) trforign_amt, sum(dd.val_amt) val_amt, sum(dd.sonik_amt) sonik_amt, (trunc(sum(dd.sonik_amt) / sum(dd.trkwa_amt) * 10000) / 100) suik_rate, case when sum(dd.trkwa_amt) >= 10000000 then 1 when sum(dd.trkwa_amt) >= 5000000 then 2 when sum(dd.trkwa_amt) >= 3000000 then 3 when sum(dd.trkwa_amt) >= 1000000 then 4 else 5 end as out_grade from ( select cc.user_id,cc.name,cc.birthday,cc.create_date,cc.goods_gubun, case when cc.goods_gubun = 1 then '예금' when cc.goods_gubun = 2 then '펀드' when cc.goods_gubun = 3 then '외화' when cc.goods_gubun = 4 then '주식' else '' end as goods_gubun_nm, cc.trkwa_amt,cc.trforign_amt,cc.val_amt, cc.sonik_amt , (trunc(cc.sonik_amt / cc.trkwa_amt * 10000) / 100) suik_rate from ( select bb.user_id,bb.name,bb.goods_gubun,bb.birthday,bb.create_date, sum(bb.trkwa_amt) trkwa_amt,sum(bb.trforign_amt) trforign_amt, sum(bb.trkwa_amt + bb.sonik_amt) val_amt, sum(bb.sonik_amt) sonik_amt from ( select aa.user_id,aa.name,aa.account_no,aa.birthday,aa.create_date, aa.goods_code,aa.goods_gubun, aa.goods_name,aa.trkwa_amt,aa.trforign_amt,aa.period_mm, aa.trbase_num,aa.ilsu,aa.tr_number,aa.curprice,aa.tr_date,aa.mangi_date,aa.tran_unit, case when aa.goods_gubun = 1 then (case when (aa.mangi_date > aa.today) then (trunc(aa.trkwa_amt * aa.trbase_num / 100 / 365 * aa.ilsu)) else trunc(aa.trkwa_amt * aa.trbase_num / 100 / 365 * (SELECT TRUNC(to_date(aa.mangi_date,'yyyymmdd') - a.birthday,to_char(a.create_date,'yyyymmdd') create_date, b.account_no,c.goods_code,c.trkwa_amt,c.trforign_amt, c.tr_number,c.trbase_num,d.goods_gubun,d.goods_name,d.provider_code,d.tran_unit, d.period_mm,d.invest_gubun,to_char(c.tr_datetime,'yyyymmdd') tr_date,to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') today, (SELECT trunc(sysdate - c.tr_datetime) AS days_difference FROM dual) ilsu, case when d.goods_gubun = 1 then to_char((SELECT ADD_MONTHS(c.tr_datetime, d.period_mm) FROM dual),'yyyymmdd') else to_char(c.tr_datetime,'yyyymmdd') end as mangi_date, case when d.goods_gubun = 1 then (select interest_rate from interestrate_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and period_mm = d.period_mm and status = 1) when d.goods_gubun = 2 then (select trbase_price from baseprice_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and status = 1) when d.goods_gubun = 3 then (select exchange_rate from exchangerate_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and seq_no = (select max(seq_no) from exchangerate_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and status = 1)) when d.goods_gubun = 4 then (select stock_price from stockprice_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and seq_no = (select max(seq_no) from stockprice_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and status = 1)) else c.trbase_num end as curprice from customer_mas a,account_mas b,transaction_his c,goods_mas d where b.ref_status = 1 and
